welcome: Welcome to the Rock, Paper, Scissor game! You versus the CPU! First one to 3 wins!
makeChoice: Please select rock (r), paper (p), or scissors (s):
validChoiceError: That's not a valid choice, please choose:
playAgain: Do you want to play again? (y or n)
playAgainError: Please enter 'y' if you want to play again, or 'n' if you do not want to play again:
